document.full_text: new jersey should capture an extra $914 million of tax revenue over the next two years, a fiscal monitor said on tuesday, a promising forecast for a state struggling to close a $4 billion deficit.
document.title: new jersey's wealthiest pump up tax revenue: report
lines_and_colors: new jersey should capture an extra $914 million of tax revenue over the next two years, a fiscal monitor said on tuesday, a promising forecast for a state struggling to close a $4 billion deficit.
